entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:20 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Colborne 10:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:03 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:03 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:03 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Clearing. High plus 4. Forecast issued 6:03 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
